pyzui.objects.scene.mainwindow module¶

PyZUI QMainWindow.

pyzui.objects.scene.mainwindow.PyZUI(*args, **kwargs)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

class pyzui.objects.scene.mainwindow.MainWindow(framerate=10, zoom_sensitivity=50)[source]¶

Bases: QMainWindow

MainWindow windows are used for displaying the PyZUI interface. This class defines all the interface affordances, menus, widgets, frames etc. Framerate and zoom_sensitivity variables have to be declared the same value as in qzui class

Constructor: MainWindow()

Create a new MainWindow.

Constructor :

MainWindow(framerate, zoom_sensitivity)

Parameters :

framerate : int zoom_sensitivity : int

Parameters:

  • framerate (int)

  • zoom_sensitivity (int)

__open_media(media_id, add=True)¶

Open the media with the given media_id.

If add is True then the media will be fit to the screen and added to the scene. Otherwise it will be returned.

Method :

__open_media(media_id, add)

Parameters :

media_id : str add : bool

__open_media(string[, bool]) -> None

Parameters:

  • media_id (str)

  • add (bool)

Return type:

Any | None
